content.rendered:
Help an American journalist uncover a dangerous terror organization in this great game.

The Letter: Seeker Of Truths Trailer

The game is about a reporter who seeking truth about origin of war and terrorism in our world.

Help an American journalist uncover a dangerous terror organization in this great game.

Controls :

WASD keys – Movement, Mouse – Camera, C – Crouch, SHIFT – Run, Spacebar – Jump, E – Interaction, P – Paus

The Letter: Seeker Of Truths Game Features

  • Beautiful low poly style graphic
  • Strong female protagonist
  • Fun and exciting stealth gameplay
  • Easy to pick up and play
  • Entertaining story with strong message

The Letter: Seeker Of Truths is a story game where you will find out at the beginning that an American journalist has been attacked.

Her office has been targeted in a terrorist attack. Her objective will be to find out who wanted to kill her and who is part of this dangerous organization. Be sure to use the help of your friends who will accompany you through the game.

Aside from that, there will be 3D graphics to enjoy and fun gameplay. Good luck with uncovering the truth.
